post.author: bpanjavan
post.title: Why Start a Blog?
post.description: Why Start a blog? My first post.
post.content:
Q: Why start a blog?

A: Several reasons exist (of course). Mine are:

- To use as a personal/public journal. My handwriting sucks so that tosses the paper option out the window. Oh, and I’ll admit, I love to type.
- To use as a personal and public way to store/share accumulated knowledge. My memory is even worse than my handwriting. I always took notes in college because I’m not capable of repeating everything that my professor’s said to me in class. If you ever have to ask yourself “Oh…gee..should I be writing this down?” The answer is yes.

That said it’s time to begin my personal/public journal and knowledge base.
